fields.label: Užuomina
fields.description: Užuomina, kuri turėtų nurodyti atsakymą.

fields.label: Atsakymas
fields.description: Atsakymas į užuominą.

fields.label: Pataisyti žodį tinklelyje
fields.description: Pažymėkite, ar norite pataisyti žodį tam tikroje tinklelio vietoje.

fields.label: Eilutė
fields.description: Eilutės indeksas, kur turėtų prasidėti atsakymas.

fields.label: Stulpelis
fields.description: Stulpelio indeksas, kur turėtų prasidėti atsakymas.

fields.label: Padėtis
fields.description: Padėtis atsakymui.

semantics.label: Bendras sprendimo žodis
semantics.description: Pasirinktinai pridėkite sprendimo žodį, kurį galima išvesti iš tam tikrų tinklelyje esančių simbolių. Jis bus matomas tik tuo atveju, jei kryžiažodyje bus rasti visi jo simboliai. Atminkite: šiai funkcijai pritaikymo palaikymo dar nėra.

fields.label: Define custom feedback for any score range
fields.description: Click the "Add range" button to add as many ranges as you need. Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!

fields.label: Fono paveikslėlis
fields.description: Select an optional background image. It will be scaled to fit the background without stretching it.

fields.label: Fono spalva
fields.description: Choose a background color. It will either be used instead of a background image or as background for transparent areas.

fields.label: Tinklelio spalva
fields.description: Pasirinkite tinklelio spalvą.

fields.label: Langelio fono spalva
fields.description: Pasirinkite lentelės langelio fono spalvą.

fields.label: Langelio teksto spalva
fields.description: Pasirinkite lentelės langelio teksto spalvą.

fields.label: Užuominos id spalva
fields.description: Pasirinkite užuominos ID spalvą lentelės langelyje.

fields.label: Langelio fono spalva (paryškinta)
fields.description: Pasirinkite paryškinto lentelės langelio fono spalvą.

fields.label: Langelio teksto spalva (paryškinta)
fields.description: Pasirinkite paryškinto lentelės langelio teksto spalvą.

fields.label: Langelio ID spalva (paryškinta)
fields.description: Choose the color of the clue id inside a table cell that is highlighted.

semantics.label: Veikimo nuostatos
semantics.description: Šios parinktys leis jums valdyti, kaip veikia užduotis.

fields.label: Rodomų žodžių skaičius
fields.description: Create a randomized batch of words from the pool. The batch will always contain at least all the words that were fixed on the grid regardless of this setting. An empty value or 0 means to use all words.

fields.label: Score words
fields.description: If this option is enabled, words will be counted in order to determine the score. Otherwise, correct characters will be counted.

fields.label: Taikyti nuobaudas
fields.description: Jei ši parinktis įjungta, už kiekvieną neteisingą atsakymą bus skiriama bauda -1.

fields.label: Cannot create crossword
fields.default: Could not generate a crossword with the given words. Please try again with fewer words or words that have more characters in common. If you are using fixed words, please make sure that their position doesn't prevent other words from being placed.

fields.label: Cannot create crossword (too few words)
fields.default: Could not generate a crossword. You need at least two words.

fields.label: Probematic words
fields.description: List words that caused trouble while generating the crossword. @words is a placeholder that will be replaced by the actual problematic words.

fields.label: Crossword grid description
fields.default: Crossword grid. Use arrow keys to navigate and keyboard to enter characters. Use tab to use input fields instead.

fields.description: Result announcer. @clue is a variable and will be replaced by the respective clue.
fields.label: Result for

fields.description: Solution announcer. @clue and @solution are variables and will be replaced by the respective values.
fields.label: Solution for

fields.description: Extra clue announcer. @clue is a variable and will be replaced by the respective value.
fields.label: Extra clue for

fields.description: Announcing the current position. @position and @length are variables and will be replaced by their respective values.
fields.label: Letter

fields.description: Announcing the word length. @length is a variable and will be replaced by the respective value.
fields.label: Length of word
Assistive technology description for "Check" button
fields.default: Check the characters. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Show Solution" button
fields.default: Show the solution. The crossword will be filled with its correct solution.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Retry" button
fields.default: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.

fields.label: Your result
fields.description: @score and @total are variables and will be replaced by their respective values.
